channel.title: [562] Help with a few things!
channel.description:
1. Sometimes players will get stuck in a void and the server will not let them login im pretty sure it has to do with the isvalid coordinates thing not sure, was wondering if anyone else has had this and if so what it was.
2. NPC and PLAYER Clipping, what the hell algos did you use, ive tried 3 different approaches and best ive gotten was it wouldnt let you walk through it but just magically tele you to the next valid tile beyond the object! :P
